content.raw:
I thought about that and came to the conclusion that I have no idea how to properly do the UX for this.
Here are some options:

We could do something like have a hierarchical context menu. 

We could do a popup asking for the file (I hate this one even more)

We could keep it the way it is and make groups draggable between files (seperate pullrequest?) this is harder but seems to be the right approach to me.
